mapper.select:
SELECT m.id, m.product_line_id productLineId, m.mapping_id mappingId, m.type, m.create_user_id createUserId, m.create_date createDate, line.product_code productCode, li.product_line_name productLineNamed FROM bs_product_line_mapping m LEFT JOIN bs_product_line line ON line.id = m.mapping_id LEFT JOIN bs_product_line li ON li.id = m.product_line_id WHERE (1=1)
${filtersql}
